alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 10:54PM EST until February 27 at 3:10PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Red Lick Road, Millers Creek Road, Dark Hollow Road, and Noland Creek Road flood in several places. At 21.5 feet, Sang Branch Road is under water at Red Lick Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Thursday the stage was 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by early Friday afternoon and continue to a crest of 24.8 feet by Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued BY 11 AM Friday.
